function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High rate of car parking area to the users reduced during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to potential crowding in limited areas","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced ventilation and air filtration systems, and monitoring and regulating occupancy levels","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air filtration technology, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Students, faculty, staff, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building regulators, facility managers"},{"Description":"Demanded cost of adaptation for building transformation","Impact":"Risk of limited resources hindering effective implementation of safety measures","Mitigation":"Seeking financial support from government or private organizations, prioritizing cost-effective solutions, exploring alternative funding sources","Technologies":"Cost-effective building materials, energy-efficient systems, sustainable design approaches","People":"Campus administrators, government building regulators, architects","Owner":"Campus administrators, government building regulators, architects"},{"Description":"Feasibility of smart rotary car parking to save space in traditional OSCP building","Impact":"Potential increase in congestion and close contact in smart parking areas","Mitigation":"Incorporating smart traffic flow management systems, implementing touchless entry and payment systems, and promoting alternative transportation methods","Technologies":"Smart traffic flow management systems, touchless entry and payment technology, alternative transportation solutions","People":"Students, faculty, staff, visitors","Owner":"Architects, facility managers, transportation authorities"}]}
